short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage and maintain a perfect volume level for TikTok Videos. Prevent your ears from being demolished.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you're tired of your ears being blown up every single time you open a TikTok video that's linked to you, or you're viewing, this extension helps with preventing that. Control and keep your volume across all TikTok videos, with a single slider. Works with multi-tabs, and saves volume in storage, on change.
